Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory257.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Deep M.I.N.D. is now shaking violently because of the red light pillars.'}
{3: "As the red dots of light diffuse, noises echo through Lucia's M.I.N.D. Her heartwarming memories have now turned into despair magnified."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna?', 3: '...Please stay here, Lucia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "No, you're not Luna. You're just an illusion.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna?', 3: "An illusion, not an imagination. I'm a story your memories put together.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nothing that Lucia says has changed anything. Her M.I.N.D. is slowly being contaminated by the red lights.'}
{2: 'Luna?', 3: "The bond you've always believed in is the real illusion here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No... It's not like that...", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "Let me show you, then... What I've seen, what the Ascension-Network has shown me, and what you're about to experience.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As Luna lifts Lucia's chin and touches her cheek, memories pour into Lucia's M.I.N.D."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory103.png'}
{3: 'Memories of when the planet formed, when oceans abounded with life, when lives were born.'}
{3: 'But then comes endless bloodshed.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory37.jpg'}
{3: 'The few spared by wars bear children, who then breed still more wars.'}
{3: 'This is how they have evolved and survived as the fittest.'}
{3: 'To stay alive, the weak have learned to be even more despicable.'}
{3: 'They deceive, betray, pretend, and lie...'}
{3: 'Following this contaminated river of time, Lucia sees a monstrous creature on the other side, having been discarded as if it was garbage.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory166.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna?', 3: 'Lucia... Are you also going to leave me, too?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The monster does not cross the river in time, and its body gradually decays, leaving traces of blood on the ground.'}
{3: 'In that instant, the barriers supporting Lucia collapse. Her vision is now dark with the rubble pinning her firmly to the ground, the red dots of light afloat taunting her.'}
{3: 'Infected and on the verge of being devoured, Lucia hears a voice.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "I believe... you'll return..."}
{2: 'Voice from Afar', 3: 'Lucia, come back...!'}
{2: 'Voice from Afar', 3: 'We can still make it! We still have a chance to make a change...!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you... Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Memories flash before her eyes, giving her strength.'}
{2: 'Voice from Afar', 3: "I believe in you the way you've believed in us... So... believe in yourself, Lucia...!"}
{3: 'She looks in the direction from which the voice came. Right above the abyss, a beacon shines bright, the same way a star would at the dead of night.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's Commandant's Mind Beacon...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "They're all... waiting for me...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With what little strength she has left, Lucia escapes from the rocks and heads for the glistening star above.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I can't change anything staying here... I need to go!", 4: '1'}
